item.title: Firefly-iii for iOS
item.description: iOS client for a personal finance manager firefly-iii

item.title: Vitacard
item.description: The application allows you to make an independent appointment with a doctor, both an adult and a child, see the history of visits. Vita Card allows you to save time and eliminate the need to visit clinics to make an appointment. Besides there is an opportunity to get referential information about all medical organizations in the region, their contacts and addresses, and also you can find out by your residential address to which clinics you concern.
